#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int 
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  {
    ll n,m;
    cin>>n>>m;
    ll val=n+m;
    ll s1=abs(val*(val+1))/2;
    ll s2=abs(n*(n+1))/2;
    ll ans=(s1-2*s2);
    cout<<ans<<endl;
  }
  return 0;
}
